name: Creativity Studio
description: Faculty and graduates students can request to use the Creativity Studio, a high-technology white-box room that can be configured for a wide variety of teaching, learning, and collaborative activities in many disciplines. It features high-definition projectors and moveable walls with dry-erase whiteboard surfaces. The Studio can be configured to host simulations, installations and virtual environments.

address.streetAddress: 1070 Partners Way Campus Box 7132 Raleigh, NC 27606
